text: Papiamento () or Papiamentu () is a creole language spoken in the Caribbean. It is the most common language on the ABC islands of Aruba, Bonaire, and Curaçao. It is also commonly spoken in Sint Eustatius and Saba. == References == Category:Languages of the Caribbean Category:Aruba Category:Bonaire Category:Curaçao
title: Papiamento
